Home.subheading: Personal photography. A collection of my favourite shots.

Info.heading: Info
Info.paragraph: I am a hobbyist photographer who appreciates simplicity - I tend to opt for more of a balanced and minimal composition in my photos.
Info.paragraph2: I am always open for casual photoshoots or to collaborate on projects. Feel free to reach out to me via email at <email>nickoless.lee@gmail.com</email> or DM me on instagram.

People.subheading: Pictures of friends and people I've met along the way.
